description: New Customers Exclusive - Get a Free 240gb SSD at Micro Center:  Check out the Micro Center Custom PC Builder:  PowerSpec G470 Gaming PC:    Intel Core i5-10400:  ASUS Z590-P Prime Motherboard:  EVGA NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 XC Graphics Card:  Neo Forza Black Faye 16GB (2 x 8GB) DDR4-3600 PC4-25600 CL18:  Inland Professional 240GB SSD:  Thermaltake Smart Series 700 Watt 80 Plus ATX Non-Modular Power Supply:  Thermaltake S300 Tempered Glass ATX Mid-Tower Computer Case - Black:   Every minute of this gaming PC build challenge I donate $10 to Team Seas.    My podcast @TheBackmarkers!  Subscribe!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:
